title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Artificial Neural Network-Based Optical Encoder Design and Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Backpropagation algorithms in multilayer artificial neural networks can be applied to process phase shift data from optical encoders
A vector neural network model that receives optical polarization information can be designed, with a training method implemented to minimize angular measurement errors from 0° to 360° within 0.5°
An experimental protocol can be developed to evaluate neural network robustness in noisy environments using simulation tools (MATLAB/Python)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
